com.actionbarsherlock.internal.widget

Class IcsLinearLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.actionbarsherlock.internal.nineoldandroids.widget.NineLinearLayout
            • com.actionbarsherlock.internal.widget.IcsLinearLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionMenuView

    public class IcsLinearLayout
extends NineLinearLayout
    A simple extension of a regular linear layout that supports the divider API of Android 4.0+. The dividers are added adjacent to the children by changing their layout params. If you need to rely on the margins which fall in the same orientation as the layout you should wrap the child in a simple FrameLayout so it can receive the margin.

      • setShowDividers

        public void setShowDividers(int showDividers)
        Set how dividers should be shown between items in this layout
        Overrides:
        setShowDividers in class android.widget.LinearLayout
        Parameters:
        showDividers - One or more of SHOW_DIVIDER_BEGINNING, SHOW_DIVIDER_MIDDLE, or SHOW_DIVIDER_END, or SHOW_DIVIDER_NONE to show no dividers.

      • getShowDividers

        public int getShowDividers()
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        A flag set indicating how dividers should be shown around items.

        protected boolean hasDividerBeforeChildAt(int childIndex)
        Determines where to position dividers between children.
        Parameters:
